strapiPost.title: An Inside Look At The Ledger
strapiPost.content:
Ledger in Bentonville is a building currently under construction that will provide unique experiences with a more flexible way to work, create, and build in a new workplace concept.

  • Building better: Initially a response to the cultural wave of desire for employee-first, flexible office spaces, Ledger grew beyond the traditional coworking concept into a collection of shared, open spaces for artistry, productivity, and life.
  • Coming together: Everything from Ledger’s architectural design to its motif of Ozark bugs carrying gems drives the building’s purpose of collective creation. 

Read the full NWA Daily article for a special inside look at Ledger HERE.
